title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo in the Photon software, it does not take focus. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: I expect the first Combo in the Photon software to take focus when clicked on.
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and try clicking on the first Combo. Note that the focus does not shift to it. Instead, press the 'Tab' key, and the focus will go to the second Combo, which is 'Repository Path:'.
